name: Space Cat: The Search For Food
name_original: Space Cat: The Search For Food
description:
NOTE: IT'S HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY THIS GAME IN FULLSCREEN

Space Cat: The Search For Food is the first video game I've ever created in Unity! It's a small arcade game where you move along a horizontal axis and collect food and stars while avoiding rocks. The game obviously isn't the most polished or professional, but it's a good start with hopefully more to come!

Please leave constructive feedback, don't feel afraid to give your real opinion!

The game was created by me, popcar2.

The art was created by my friend, Adham.
